data.name: Continuous Clockwork Inspiration
data.description: A room based around a clockwork workshop with enough machinery processing equipment to meet most artisans' needs.\nSome Fontainian poets believe that clockwork meka are creations worthy of respect, respect that should shine upon the artisan's tools as well. "Inspiration inclines the ears of these components, it teaches them to dance as one at a pace perpetual."

text.text: With storage heaters like this, adding an extra layer of heating elements makes them more durable than is usually advertized.
And the motor in this kind of fan is always running at critical velocity, which poses a safety issue...

...Sorry! I tend to get carried away when I start talking about this kind of stuff. Um, with your permission, though, I could definitely tweak them so they run a lot better! At least, Iâ€”I think I could...
